This elegant home, situated on a corner lot, welcomes an abundance of light throughout its two stories. Recently upgraded hardwood floors adorn much of the first level, complemented by high ceilings and a cozy fireplace upon entry. The kitchen has been thoughtfully renovated with new appliances, ample storage, quartz countertops and a sliding door that offers a picturesque view of the beautifully landscaped yard. Access to the outdoors is seamless from every room on the main level, inviting you to enjoy the garden, fresh sod, and deck ideal for outdoor dining amidst the harmonious dance of nature. Convenience meets elegance on the main floor, where a family room, complete with a gas fireplace, offers comfort and warmth. This space also boasts a full bathroom, which is unique for this model. An expansive primary suite, featuring its own fireplace, office and double closet is designed with a modern organic aesthetic. Adjacent, two bedrooms share another bathroom.  Option to convert the primary office space into a fourth bedroom. Completing the picture of luxury living is a three-car garage and proximity to community amenities like the pool. Private security adds an extra layer of comfort!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Marco Vaticano - Agt: 925-948-5179 - OFFERS DUE 2/21 @ 11a. Welcome home to peaceful Millsmont, one of Oakland’s hidden neighborhood gems. Delmont Avenue brings a little slice of the Oakland hills with its quiet, tree-lined street, equipped with ample parking and space for a casual stroll. Step through the entry way and you are greeting by an updated kitchen including shaker cabinetry, granite countertops marble backsplash and breakfast bar. Enjoy entertaining? No problem. With an open concept layout, guests have easy access to charcuterie and wine on the bar top as everyone gathers to enjoy a movie. Enjoy peace of mind with a brand new set of appliances including: dishwasher, gas range, french-door refrigerator and washer + dryer! If getting out in nature is your thing, you'll appreciate Leona Canyon Regional Preserve, Lake Chabot and the Oakland Zoo all within a ten-minute drive. The backyard eagerly awaits your vision - perhaps a guest suite, she-shed, or detached home office? Exceptional value for a 3-bed/2-full bath single family home in Oakland! Potential for attractive financing under First Republic's Eagle Community program, offering qualified borrowers a discounted interest rate and up to $4,000 in closing costs.

PLEASE - make sure you properly secure the padlock back and PLACE THIS KEY BACK IN THE CABINET DRAWER. THANK YOU! :) Sellers are open to entertain offers as they come. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Theresa Hope Broderick - 510-967-2294 - Contemporary spacious home in the hidden-gem Leona Heights neighborhood of the Oakland Hills. This large 4 bedroom, 2.5 bath home features an open modern floor plan with room for all. Home boasts a light filled formal living room with vaulted ceiling and box beam detail. A sizeable eat-in kitchen opens to a second living room with fireplace. Sliding doors lead out to a sunny deck that is ideal for relaxing after a long day. On a clear day you can even see the peaks of the bay and golden gate bridges! There is a formal dining room perfect for guests & entertaining with views of the hills and bay. The home features a true primary bedroom suite with bay views, a large walk in closet, and a custom remodeled bathroom with a soaking tub, barn door, and dual sinks! The lower level has three spacious bedrooms, one bath, laundry, wine cellar and a theater room. There is access to a back garden and second deck that is ideal for play, gardening, and relaxing in the sun. Additional features include air conditioning, a good sized garage with interior access, and a welcoming covered front porch. The property is energy efficient, with solar panels, and an outlet for EV charging in the garage. Commuters dream, and minutes to East Bay hiking trails, shopping and great schools!

Whether you're starting a new chapter in life or looking for an investment opportunity, this home offers the perfect blend of comfort, charm & unbeatable views. Welcome to your new home sweet home!
Showing Instruction: Check with Listing Agent. Note: Security Fence Door has 2 locks - deadbolt and drawstring operated.

It's convenient location is perfect for commuters as it is close to highway 580 and public transportation. Possibilities abound for both first-time home buyers or seasoned investors. All are welcome!

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Stunningly remodeled and fully detached, this multi-level 2,225 sq ft home is privately nestled in the serene woodland hillside of Millsmont. The main level greets you into a spacious living room, sun-drenched dining room, and an elegantly remodeled kitchen equipped with new appliances and quartz countertops. The interior staircase leads to a bright top floor with 3 cozy bedrooms. Step out onto the expansive decks with luxurious awnings, where you can enjoy the natural beauty of the hillside and listen to the tranquil stream. The lower-level family/office room, bonus yoga room, 2-car parking, and laundry hookups complete this home. The extensive 7,544 lot sq ft provides ample opportunities for outdoor entertainment or an Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU). Easily accessible to Maxwell and McCrea Memorial Parks, Mills College, public transportation and Highway 580, this home is located in a highly desirable neighborhood that you don't want to miss!
Confidential Remarks: Go direct and show! Please text Bill Mar at 415-203-2363 for instruction on offer and questions. Pre-Escrow opened with Nancy Chan, First American Title. Sellers would appreciate the escrow stays with First American Title. Please kindly submit an offer via Homelight (DisclosureIO).
